      void PaladinAbility.Heal.useBattleCommand(Hero hero, Hero other)
      Applies the defensive status to the current acting hero.

      Abstract method which will be defined in the subclasses dependent on their Heros field affected.

      Uses the item on the given hero.

      Use the battle command in battle.
      void AbilityItem.useBattleCommand(Hero hero, Hero target)
      Use the AbilityItem, if the hero's ability points are at their maximum this method will throw a MaximumStatException.
